title: Italy is nice....
content: Italy is nice.... I am about to have a walk in the piazza rain or no.
author: ebensorkin

comments.content:
It is. It is. I love IT. Where are you, or where have you been, so far?  
_(It's still and always has been one of the destinations I am considering to finally settle and reside, one day. ;)_
I was in Sassuolo, Modena & Parma. I am back in the UK now. It was just a 3 day trip.

I love Italy! I've been to Milan and Rome a few times, Venice, Florence, Verona, Treviso, Como and Pisa just once. This summer we're going south, to Naples.  
I'd love to move there for the retirement years, the better half is already studying the language…

What do you mean, "the better half"?

ChrisL
